section.section: A licensee or holder of a temporary license may only practice under the supervision of a licensed physician.
The failure of a licensed physician to properly supervise a licensee is unprofessional conduct in the practice of medicine under § 14-404(a)(3) of this title.

Except as provided in paragraph (2) of this subsection, the practice of a radiation therapist, radiographer, nuclear medicine technologist, radiologist assistant, or holder of a temporary license is limited to those procedures, operations, preparations, and practices listed in regulation.

A radiologist assistant may not:
Interpret images;
Make diagnoses; or
Prescribe medications or therapies.
